executionArgs.additionalInstruction: Test all backend API endpoints thoroughly including: 1) Health check endpoint, 2) Poll creation with valid/invalid data, 3) Poll retrieval by share code, 4) Vote submission with anti-abuse checks (duplicate votes, rate limiting), 5) Error handling for non-existent polls. Also test performance aspects: response times for each endpoint, behavior under multiple rapid requests. The backend server is running on http://localhost:4000.
